Title: Relates to authorizing a local supplemental tax on passenger car rentals in the city of Rochester
Summary: Relates to authorizing a local supplemental tax on passenger car rentals in the city of Rochester; provides the rate of such tax shall not exceed five percent of the consideration given or contracted to be given for such property, or for the use of such property.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to authorizing a local supplemental tax on passenger car rentals in the city of Rochester
